content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Cloud Accounts - AWS accounts automatically connect after stack deployment November 20, 2023—When adding a new AWS cloud account, the account automatically connects and registers to Trend Vision One after stack deployment in AWS completes. Connecting a new AWS account no longer requires copying the role ARN to complete the process. The new process requires using the latest version of the stack template. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Cloud Accounts - AWS accounts automatically connect after stack deployment
